channel.title: PI servers
channel.description: You can't add commands like ::runes ::bandos etc??

item.title: PI servers
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

[quote=“pk2play, post:4, topic:412953”] } else if (playerCommand.equals("runes")) { for(int i = 554; i < 567; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(i, 250000); }
Basically this is just a loop to get all of the items 554-567 and it is gonna add 250k of those item id’s.[/quote]
Try what he said, but put it in the commands class located in src>server>model>players>packets
and don’t have the else if.

if(playerCommand.equals("runes")) { for(int i = 554; i < 567; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(i, 250000); }

Read full topic

item.title: PI servers
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

} else if (playerCommand.equals("runes")) { for(int i = 554; i < 567; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(i, 250000); }
Basically this is just a loop to get all of the items 554-567 and it is gonna add 250k of those item id’s.
